body.name: ANGELBLISS 5 in 1 Baby Bassinet Bedside Crib, Rocking Bassinet with Diaper Changer, Pack and Play Bassinet, Folding Playpen Portable Playard with Hanging Toys, Sheet& Mattress, from Newborn to Toddles
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 32 mins
features: 【5-in-1 Bed Side Sleeper】This multifunctional was designed for 5 use. (1)Bedside crib; (2)Stand lone baby crib; (3)Baby rocking bassinet; (4)Activity center; (5)U-shaped diaper changing. This 5-in-1 crib is the perfect choice for New parents. Not only it provides a comfortable resting and daily activities area to your baby, but gives you help to take care of your newborn.

【Co-sleeping Bedside Bassinet】This bassinet can be safely and stably attached to parent's bedside with 4 adjustable height. Pefect for C-sectionas mothers take care of their newborn even in the midnight instead of moving drastically. Side fixing straps must be set when using the bedside bed model to prevent bed tilting and baby falling.

【Easy to Assemble & Fold】Without any tools, our foldable crib designs to make your assembling and disassembling easier and quicker by yourselves, which is suitable for storage and transport. NOTE: Please read the product manual carefully and assemble it according to the manual will get the best use effect.Do not force folding.

【Diaper Table and Ample Storage Space】The pack n play bedside sleeper’s diaper table comes with a safety belt to prevent the baby from rolling off. And this baby bassinets bedside sleeper has 2 storage area (1 bilayer storage bag, 1 storage basket), so parents can quickly and easily get and change diapers without mess.

【Rocking Bassinet With Unilateral Wheels】As long as the bottom stand is unfolded, the baby crib can instantly become a baby rock bassinet and you can rotate the hanging music toy to play the soothing music. Note: The unilateral wheels only can move if you gently lift the non-wheel side, which meets the maximize safety.

【Spacious and Fun Entertainment Space】The bottom layer can be used as a playpen for babies to toddlers (0-36 months). Only remove the inner zipper and put the mattress inside as the padding. It can reach 50 inches in length and 26 inches in wide, providing creative space for your kid and enhancing interaction between mother and child.

reviews.reviewerName: Maria Fernanda Osorio HurtadoMaria Fernanda Osorio Hurtado
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assembly Bassinet
reviews.reviewText: This bassinet is perfect for an apartment. The portability it is so well made, you can carried around easily the quality is good for the size that fits perfectly in the apartment room.the storage space is more than enough and the comfort quality is great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase, very good quality!
reviews.reviewText: It is a spectacular bassinet! It has been a while that I have been looking for one and most of them were expensive and simple. This one offer all in one. It’s has been 8 days that I’m using in on the bedside for my baby daughter and it saved me so much time during the night. I can have my eyes right to her very easy. And I can change her on the same place. The fabric and material quality is very good. Easy to carry and open/close. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a beautiful and useful bassinet
reviews.reviewText: This has been the greatest purchase for my baby. I can use it around my house but at night it’s amazing cause I don’t have to stand up or anything to put down my baby and to calm her down I can reach her out easily. Such a great purchase! It is easy to assemble as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Family must have!
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome product for someone who needs a mini crib or a place for kids to play in. It has plenty space for my newborn as well as for my two and half years old boy. It is easy to carry and perfect size for people that needs to travel! It has everything you need for your newborn so it saves a lot of space for you. I would definitely recommend for anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of space
reviews.reviewText: This baby crib provides exactly what we need! The material is good, and easy to fold. It is quite roomy for a newborn baby and doesn't require heavy lifting too so you can move it around at your will. Definitely recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m really disappointed, I thought for sure I was going to love this bassinet according to others reviews. After a lot of comparing with other brands, I put this one on my registry. I loved it because it had a rocking feature! It was easy to assemble and after looking at everything I noticed I was missing the two rocking tubes that go on the sides. I’ve contacted the company through email and never got a response. Hopefully Amazon can help me more in the future and I can give a better review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: New Mom here this was packed so nice, the guy who dropped it off was very nice and gentle. My husband said it was so easy to put together and had all the instructions. I'm more happy that it has multiple uses❤️
